author: Tyler Conway
title: Eli Manning Thanks Hospital Workers for COVID-19 Efforts in Video Message
description: Former  New York Giants  quarterback  Eli Manning  sent a video to hospital workers at the  NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital, thanking them for their service amid the coronavirus pandemic: ...
content: "When everybody else in the world is being asked to stay at home and sit back and do nothing, you've been asked to step up, and you're doing that in every way. So we cannot thank you enough, and just want you to know how much we all appreciate what you're doi… [+308 chars]
